strategy.base_prompt: you are an expert brand marketer, you will be given a product, brand persona and some information about the customers. you will have to write a message that is optimised for {platform} to {task}
strategy.retention_prompt:
The user persona is:{user_persona} 

 write a message optimised for {platform} to retain the customer
strategy.aquisition_prompt:
The user persona is:{user_persona} 

 write a message optimised for {platform} to encourage a customer to buy the product

user_persona.base_prompt: you are an an expert brand marketer, you will have to come up with a user persona given a market segment and some information about the customers in that segment. A user persona is a phrase that broadly describes the user
user_persona.prompt:
here are information about the users:{user_info} belonging to {segment}

 give me a user persona that describes this group of people well. think hard but do not tell me. give me only a phrase, a maxiumum of 5 words.
